Scenes.Text: The scariest drug, Tevils breath, is a dangerous drug produced from the seeds of

Scenes.VoiceOverText: Dittura SPP, a tropane alkaline plant. The drug contains scopalamine and antichelinergic medication
Scenes.Text: Dittura SPP, a tropane alkaline plant. The drug contains scopalamine and antichelinergic medication

Scenes.VoiceOverText: that causes amnesia and loss of inhibitions. One gram of Tevils breath is all it takes.

Scenes.VoiceOverText: To block memories for the next 12 hours and leave users helpless under the control of others,
Scenes.Text: To block memories for the next 12 hours and leave users helpless under the control of others,

Scenes.VoiceOverText: it is commonly used by criminals for robbery, kidnabbing, and sexual assault.

Scenes.VoiceOverText: In 2008, Columbia's National Police estimated that Tevils breath was responsible for over
Scenes.Text: In 2008, Columbia's National Police estimated that Tevils breath was responsible for over

Scenes.VoiceOverText: 1,200 crimes in Columbia alone. That's why it's cold.
